name: Pugs Puppies Pre-sale
description:
The Pugs Parents collection is the exclusive pre-sale gateway into the enchanting world of Pugs Puppies, serving as the roots of this family tree on the vibrant TON blockchain. Pugs Puppies will be created by the renowned TON artist Ilya Polutis, celebrated for his signatures Fred the Pug and Ton Fish collections. Pugs Parents embodies the loving spirit and dedication of pug owners who nurture and raise their puppies with care.

Holding a Pugs Parents NFT is more than owning art, it's stepping into the role of a devoted pug parent, symbolizing the beginning of a journey where your digital companion will grow and evolve alongside you. Owners of Pugs Parents NFTs will be rewarded with exclusive benefits, including two NFTs on the Pugs Puppies official launch, positioning them at the forefront of this living, evolving ecosystem.

Together with $PUG token benefits and future upgrades, Pugs Parents holders help build a thriving community dedicated to celebrating the bond between collector and collectible. This collection honors the tender guardianship and joyful anticipation that every pug parent knows and treasures, and it lays the foundation for the magical journey of raising your puppy on-chain.
